verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid, [A Psalm] of David בְּשַׁנּוֹת֣וֹ <WH8138> be-shan-no-To when he changed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- טַ֭עְמוֹ <WH2940> ta'-mo his behaviour לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH40> 'a-vi-Me-lech; Abimelech וַֽ֝יְגָרֲשֵׁ֗הוּ <WH1644> vay-ga-ra-She-hu, who drove him away וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ <WH1980> vai-ye-Lach. along אֲבָרֲכָ֣ה <WH1288> 'a-va-ra-Chah I will bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all עֵ֑ת <WH6256> 'Et; at all times תָּ֝מִ֗יד <WH8548> ta-Mid, [shall] continually תְּֽהִלָּת֥וֹ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To his praise בְּפִֽי׃ <WH6310> be-Fi. [be] in my mouth

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh This עָנִ֣י <WH6041> 'a-Ni This poor man קָ֭רָא <WH7121> Ka-ra cried וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD שָׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> sha-Me-a'; heard וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> u-mik-kol- of all צָ֝רוֹתָ֗יו <WH6869> tza-ro-Tav, him out of all his troubles הוֹשִׁיעֽוֹ׃ <WH3467> ho-shi-'O. חֹנֶ֤ה <WH2583> cho-Neh encampeth מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> mal-'ach- The angel יְהוָ֓ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD סָ֘בִ֤יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about לִֽירֵאָ֗יו <WH3373> li-re-'Av, them that fear וַֽיְחַלְּצֵֽם׃ <WH2502> Vay-chal-le-Tzem. him and delivereth

נְצֹ֣ר <WH5341> ne-Tzor Keep לְשׁוֹנְךָ֣ <WH3956> le-shon-Cha thy tongue מֵרָ֑ע <WH7451> me-Ra'; from evil וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ <WH8193> u-se-fa-Tei-cha, and thy lips מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> mid-dab-Ber from speaking מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> mir-Mah. guile

ס֣וּר <WH5493> sur Depart מֵ֭רָע <WH7451> Me-ro' from evil וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> va-'a-seh- and do ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; good בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> bak-Kesh seek שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom peace וְרָדְפֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7291> ve-ra-de-Fe-hu. and pursue

עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> 'ei-Nei The eyes יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- are toward צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim; [are] upon the righteous וְ֝אָזְנָ֗יו <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Nav, and his ears אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- are toward שַׁוְעָתָֽם׃ <WH7775> shav-'a-Tam. [are open] unto their cry

פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei The face יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּעֹ֣שֵׂי <WH6213> be-'O-sei [is] against them that do רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; evil לְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> le-hach-Rit to cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <WH2143> zich-Ram. the remembrance

צָעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> tza-'a-Ku [The righteous] cry וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD שָׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> sha-Me-a'; heareth וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> u-mik-kol- of all צָ֝רוֹתָ֗ם <WH6869> tza-ro-Tam, them out of all their troubles הִצִּילָֽם׃ <WH5337> hitz-tzi-Lam. and delivereth

קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> ka-Rov [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <WH7665> le-nish-be-rei- unto them that are of a broken לֵ֑ב <WH3820> Lev; heart וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et דַּכְּאֵי־ <WH1793> dak-ke-'ei- such as be of a contrite ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach spirit יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> yo-Shi-a'. and saveth
